name: windowMessageListener
description:
A decorator or higher order component that provides methods
for cross-origin communication (between iframes/windows).

see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/postMessage

params.name: messageHandler
params.description: a handler for messages receieved by the component

params.name: validSource
params.description: an optional function that would restrict message handling to a specified source.

returns.description: a function that decorates a React component with the behavior
